Title: Requires sex offenders, regardless of their classification, to annually register with the division of criminal justice services for life
Summary: Requires sex offenders, regardless of their classification, to annually register with the division of criminal justice services for life; eliminates the ability of level 2 sex offenders to petition for relief from registering in the future after having been registered for 30 years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring sex offenders to register for life and eliminating the petition for relief
